plugin.name: Portable Junk Recycler Mk 2
plugin.description:
The main plugin file. Required.
A highly configurable device that will scrap junk items transferred into its inventory, returning the component parts.

plugin.name: None Active (Default)
plugin.description:
Leaves the recipe in the "UTILITY" category from vanilla.
The plugin files for the overrides are installed to the "Optional" folder in case you change your mind later.

plugin.name: AWKCR Devices
plugin.description:
Move the Portable Junk Recycler Mk 2 recipe to the "DEVICES" category from AWKCR.
Requires AWKCR v5.0+ (https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/6091).
The plugin files for the other overrides are installed into the "Optional" folder in case you change your mind later.

plugin.name: AWKCR Other
plugin.description:
Move the Portable Junk Recycler Mk 2 recipe to the "OTHER" category from AWKCR.
Requires AWKCR v1.68+ (https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/6091).
The plugin files for the other overrides are installed into the "Optional" folder in case you change your mind later.

plugin.name: AWKCR Tools
plugin.description:
Move the Portable Junk Recycler Mk 2 recipe to the "TOOLS" category from AWKCR.
Requires AWKCR v5.0+ (https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/6091).
The plugin files for the other overrides are installed into the "Optional" folder in case you change your mind later.

plugin.name: LKR Devices
plugin.description:
Move the Portable Junk Recycler Mk 2 recipe to the "DEVICES" category from Lively's Keyword Resource.
Requires Lively's Keyword Resource v1.0+ (https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/51510).
The plugin files for the other overrides are installed into the "Optional" folder in case you change your mind later.

plugin.name: LKR Utility
plugin.description:
Move the Portable Junk Recycler Mk 2 recipe to the "UTILITY" category from Lively's Keyword Resource.
Requires Lively's Keyword Resource v1.0+ (https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/51510).
The plugin files for the other overrides are installed into the "Optional" folder in case you change your mind later.

plugin.name: None (Default)
plugin.description: None of the interesting configurations are installed, and all options start at their defaults.

plugin.name: Brainiac
plugin.description:
Ur smrt. Liek rly smrt.
- Set "Multiplier Adjustments > Intelligence > Adjustment Per Point Of Intelligence" to `0.2`.

plugin.name: Leprechaun
plugin.description:
Luck is _really_ important to you. So much so that you set it to be the only multiplier adjustment you use.
- Set "Settings > Adjustment Options > (everything not Luck)" to `OFF` if it can be - Set "Settings > Multiplier Adjustments > Adjustment Per Point Of Luck" to `0.5`

plugin.name: Loot PiÃ±ata
plugin.description:
All junk items now explode in showers of components (figuratively).
- Set "Multiplier Adjustments > (everything)" to max

plugin.name: Magnum Opus Wabbajack Modlist
plugin.description:
If you use Wabbajack to install the Magnum Opus modlist by Lively, you can set the Portable Junk Recycler Mk 2 to mimic the way the Scrapper perk works.
- Set "Multiplier Adjustments > Scrapper: Rank 1 > In Player-Owned Settlements" to `0.2` - Set "Multiplier Adjustments > Scrapper: Rank 2 > In Player-Owned Settlements" to `0.2` - Set "Multiplier Adjustments > Scrapper: Rank 3 > In Player-Owned Settlements" to `0.5`

plugin.name: No Bonuses
plugin.description:
You just want to junk items on the go, no muss, no fuss, don't care about bonuses.
- Set "Settings > Adjustment Options > Intelligence Affects Multiplier" to `OFF` - Set "Settings > Adjustment Options > Luck Affects Multiplier" to `OFF` - Set "Settings > Adjustment Options > Scrapper Perk Affects Multiplier" to `OFF`

plugin.name: No Scrapper, No Scrap
plugin.description:
Configures the Mk 2 so that you don't get any components unless you have at least 1 rank in the Scrapper perk.
- Set "Settings > General Options > Base Multiplier" to `0.0` - Set "Settings > Adjustment Options > (everything not Scrapper)" to `OFF` if it can be - Set "Multiplier Adjustments > Scrapper: Rank X" to `1.0`/`1.1`/`1.2`/etc. for Scrapper rank 1/2/3/etc.

plugin.name: OG Portable Junk Recycler
plugin.description:
You want to experience the original Portable Junk Recycler once again (minus the crashy bits), complete with everything that entails, including no automatic movement of junk items.
- Set "Settings > Adjustment Options > Intelligence Affects Multiplier" to `OFF` - Set "Settings > Adjustment Options > Luck Affects Multiplier" to `OFF` - Set "Settings > Adjustment Options > Scrapper Perk Affects Multiplier" to `OFF` - Set "Recycler Interface > Behavior > Enable Junk Filter" to `OFF` - Set "Recycler Interface > Behavior > Automatically Transfer Junk" to `OFF` - Set "Recycler Interface > Behavior > Enable "Always Automatically Transfer" List" to `OFF` - Set "Recycler Interface > Behavior > Enable "Never Automatically Transfer" List" to `OFF` - Set "Recycler Interface > Behavior > Return Items Silently" to `OFF`

plugin.name: Punishing Field Use
plugin.description:
Heavily incentivize the use of settlements.
- Set "Multiplier Adjustments > General > Everywhere Else" to `-0.9`.

plugin.name: The Gambler
plugin.description:
Submit yourself to the will of RNGesus.
- Set "Settings > Adjustment Options > Randomness" to `ON (Simple)` - Set "Settings > Adjustment Options > (everything not Randomness)" to `OFF` if it can be. - Set "Multiplier Adjustments > Randomness > Minimum" to `-1.0` - Set "Multiplier Adjustments > Randomness > Maximum" to `1.0`
